altername_name: Schütze Mike and the Treasure of the Incas
name: Schütze Mike
overview: Backbone demo created while also using AMOS by Steffen Baier in 2017. It is a platform game. Mike heard of a fabled treasure, the long lost civilization of the Incas. So he made on the way to South America. Hardly was he there when the adventure began. When he found gold coins in the jungle, it was clear that he was on the right track. What awaits our hero in the jungle and what treasure and danger will he find there?
